column2:
"Oh, Oh My!
If it isn't Ms. Hitsugi. Why are you wandering around here?"
"Oh, you're uh...Lisa, right?"
"Yes yes, Lisa here. Are you prepared to get shot at by Lisa?"
"No, just...a bunch of things happened..."
"A bunch of things happened, so you want to get shot at by Lisa, do you?"
"No, that's not..."
"That's not what you mean? Since when do you need a reason to be shot at?"
"Well, you see..."
"Hmm, hmmm. So your older brother died. I see, I see, you have my sympathy."
"But Lisa wonders how to sympathize with the hearts of others."
"Lisa has no understanding of the feelings of others, only prefers to be direct."

"So, how did he die?
If he died from an explosion, was there a mess? Or was he flat like a pancake?"
"...I don't know."
"If you don't know, then it's unknown if he's really dead. You can't be sure if he's dead if you can't find the body, right?"
"I'm not interested in the details, but I was interested in explosives so I can understand for reference..."
"....Thank you, Lisa."
"No idea why you're thanking Lisa, so I'll say you're welcome."
"While I can't go and confirm what really happened..."
"I'll make sure if he's really dead..."
"Fufu. If you cannot bare to look at it yourself, feel free to call Lisa instead."
"Now then, if you feel like being shot at by Lisa, give a shout."
"Oh and if it's possible, could you bring Aru along for shooting too? If you take that offer, I'll be very happy."
"Big sis..."
"Oh, Aru, and <%me>."
"Big sis, are you OK?"
"I'm fine, I'm fine. While we were only talking about disturbing things, I feel oddly fine now."
